   <script type="text/javascript">
    var Countrylist = {
 			
 			Get: function(e)
 			{
 				var list = $("ul", this).clone(true);
 				
 				$(".activeregion").removeClass("activeregion");
 				
 				$("#countriesList")
 					.empty()
 					.append(list)
 					.attr("class", "clr current-" + $(this).attr("id"))
 					
 				$(this).addClass("activeregion");
 				$.cookie("lk_selected_region", $(this).attr("id"), {expires: 365});
 				
 			}
 			
 		}
 		
 		/**
 		* Set a cookie for chosen language so we can display proper 
 		* quicklink next time.
 		*/
 		$().ready(function() {
 			$(".countrypicker").click(function(e) {
 				$.cookie("lk_selected_lang", this.rel, {expires: 365});
 			});
 			
 			$(".tabs > li").click(Countrylist.Get);
 
 			if ($.cookie("lk_selected_region") != null);
 				$(".tabs > li#" + $.cookie("lk_selected_region")).trigger("click");
 
 			$("#quickselect").change(function() {
 			    if (this.selectedIndex > 0)
 			        document.location.href = $(this).val();
 			});
 			
 			$("a[rel=external]").click(function(e){
 				var n = "popwin_" + Math.random();
 				n = n.replace(".", "");
 				var w = window.open(this.href, n);
 				return false;
 			});
 			
 		})
   </script>
